preface.title: This works: xincluded content resolved via rewriteURI/rewriteSystem
preface.para:
I'm from an xincluded file where the xincluded file's path was resolved via rewriteURI/rewriteSystem. I.e. <xi:include href="file://docshared/content/content.xml"/> was resolved via:
<rewriteURI uriStartString='file://docshared/' rewritePrefix='../'/> <rewriteSystem systemIdStartString='file://docshared/' rewritePrefix='../'/>
